definitions.definition: A person who edits or makes changes to documents .
A person who edited a specific document.
examples: John Johnson wrote this term paper and the editor was Joan Johnson.

definitions.definition: A person at a newspaper , publisher or similar institution who edits stories and/or decides which ones to publish .
examples: John is the city editor at the Daily Times .

definitions.definition: A machine used for editing (cutting and splicing) movie film
A program for creating and making changes to files , especially text files .
examples: The TPU EVE editor is an excellent, extensible, programmable editor .

definitions.definition: Someone who manipulates video footage and assembles it into the correct order etc for broadcast; a picture editor .

main_definition: A person who edits or makes changes to documents .
secondary_definitions: A person who edited a specific document.
A person at a newspaper , publisher or similar institution who edits stories and/or decides which ones to publish .
A machine used for editing (cutting and splicing) movie film
( computing ) A program for creating and making changes to files , especially text files .
( television , cinematography ) Someone who manipulates video footage and assembles it into the correct order etc for broadcast; a picture editor .
